title: History Extra podcast - April 2011
itunes:title: History Extra podcast - April 2011
itunes:subtitle: David Edgerton explains why Britain was no underdog in the Second World War, Lucy looks at how hairstyles reflected political and social change and Chris Evans discusses British involvement in Latin American slavery.
description:
David Edgerton explains why Britain was no underdog in the Second World War, Lucy looks at how hairstyles reflected political and social change and Chris Evans discusses British involvement in Latin American slavery.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
